item.title: Periodic Classification of Elements
item.description: 1. Introduction Till date, humans have come across 118 different elements. Out of the 118, only 94 are found in nature. So some scientists decided to classify these elements. Many scientists came up with many different methods, but not all of them were great. Let's look at some of them. 1.1 Some terms to keep in mind Atomic number: The number of protons* present in an atom. Atomic mass: Sum of the number of protons and neutrons in an atom.
